CustomField.description: This is the control that resolved the material risk or generated the issue log. When this field is set: 1. the process is updated to set the control as a customization, 2. the customization field on the process issue is set and 3. the customization is updated to identify the process as the controlled process.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the control that resolved the material risk or generated the issue log. (see description for details)
CustomField.label: Control
